statements: SELECT * FROM MediaFiles;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_type FROM MediaFiles ORDER BY file_type;
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles WHERE creator_id = 100;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM MediaFiles WHERE creator_id = 1 ORDER BY file_size DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_type = 'image' AND file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, file_type, creator_id FROM MediaFiles WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY creator_id, date_created DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT file_type FROM MediaFiles ORDER BY file_type ASC;
SELECT AVG(file_size) AS average_size, MAX(file_size) AS max_size, MIN(file_size) AS min_size FROM MediaFiles;
SELECT * FROM content_creators ORDER BY creator_id DESC;
SELECT creator_name, created_at FROM content_creators WHERE creator_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM multimedia_files WHERE creator_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM content_creators WHERE creator_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT creator_name, file_name FROM content_creators JOIN multimedia_files ON content_creators.creator_id = multimedia_files.creator_id;
SELECT * FROM content_creators;
SELECT creator_name, created_at FROM content_creators WHERE creator_id = 1;
SELECT creator_name, file_name, file_type FROM content_creators JOIN multimedia_files ON content_creators.creator_id = multimedia_files.creator_id;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_files ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT creator_name, file_name FROM content_creators JOIN multimedia_files ON content_creators.creator_id = multimedia_files.creator_id WHERE file_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_type = 'image';
SELECT creator_name, email, social_media FROM Creators WHERE subscription_type = 'premium';
SELECT file_name, file_type, tag_name FROM MediaFiles JOIN Tags ON MediaFiles.file_id = Tags.tag_id;
SELECT file_name, creator_name, create_date FROM MediaFiles JOIN Creators ON MediaFiles.creator_id = Creators.creator_id;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM MediaFiles WHERE creator_id = 1;
SELECT file_id, file_name, creator_name FROM MediaFiles INNER JOIN Creators ON MediaFiles.creator_id = Creators.creator_id;
SELECT tag_name, creator_name FROM Tags CROSS JOIN Creators;
SELECT file_name, creator_name, create_date FROM MediaFiles INNER JOIN Creators ON MediaFiles.creator_id = Creators.creator_id WHERE file_type = 'image';
SELECT Creators.creator_name, COUNT(MediaFiles.file_id) AS total_files FROM MediaFiles INNER JOIN Creators ON MediaFiles.creator_id = Creators.creator_id GROUP BY Creators.creator_name;
SELECT * FROM media_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, file_type, upload_date FROM media_files WHERE file_type='image';
SELECT creator_name, creator_email, join_date FROM creators WHERE creator_type='photographer';
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT f.file_name, c.category_name FROM media_files f INNER JOIN file_categories fc ON f.file_id = fc.file_id INNER JOIN categories c ON c.category_id = fc.category_id
SELECT * FROM media_files WHERE file_id = 1
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM media_files WHERE file_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY file_type DESC
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM media_files WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01' AND file_size > 1000 ORDER BY upload_date ASC

SELECT creators.creator_name, creators.creator_email, categories.category_name FROM creators JOIN file_categories ON creators.creator_id = file_categories.file_id JOIN categories ON categories.category_id = file_categories.category_id ORDER BY creators.creator_name

SELECT media_files.file_name, categories.category_name FROM media_files LEFT JOIN file_categories ON media_files.file_id = file_categories.file_id LEFT JOIN categories ON categories.category_id = file_categories.category_id WHERE file_size < 5000 ORDER BY file_name ASC, category_name DESC
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM MediaFiles
SELECT file_name, owner_id, date_uploaded FROM MediaFiles ORDER BY date_uploaded DESC
SELECT creator_name, creation_date, email FROM Creators WHERE total_files > 10
SELECT MediaFiles.file_name, Tags.tag_name FROM MediaFiles INNER JOIN FileTags ON MediaFiles.file_id = FileTags.file_id INNER JOIN Tags ON FileTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_type, category_name FROM MediaFiles JOIN Categories ON MediaFiles.file_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT creator_name, total_files FROM Creators WHERE total_files > 5 ORDER BY creator_name DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size, tag_name FROM MediaFiles JOIN FileTags ON MediaFiles.file_id = FileTags.file_id JOIN Tags ON FileTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_files FROM MediaFiles JOIN Categories ON MediaFiles.file_id = Categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_files DESC;
